original: slob ma rnams la sgo drung du khrus bya /
analyzed: slob ma rnams la sgo drung du khru byed

original: bgegs gtor / ram yam kham gis bsang sbyang /
analyzed: bgegs thor ram yam kham gis bsang sbyong

original: stong pa'i ngang las b+h+ru~m las rin po che'i snod yangs shing rgya che ba'i nang du gtor ma kha dog dri ro nus pa phun sum tshhogs par gyur /
analyzed: stong ba ngang las b+h+ru~m las rin po che snod yangs shing rgya che ba nang du thor ma kha dog dri ro nus ba phun sum tshhogs ba gyur

original: a+o~m ahhu~m gis byin gyis brlab /

analyzed: sarba b+huta a kar+sha ya dzah

analyzed: sarba b+huta i dam ba lim ta kha kha kha hi kha his sngo

original: hu~m: rang byung snying po sgom pa la :
analyzed: hu~m: rang byung snying po sgom ba la

original: mi dbang ma rig bdud kyi tshhogs :
analyzed: mi dbang ma rig bdud kyi tshhogs

analyzed: pha mtha bral ba klong du dengs

original: hu~m hu~m hu~m phata?:
analyzed: hu~m hu~m hu~m phata?:

original: ces dang / na mo /

original: rtsha brgyud kyi bla ma mchog gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshho'i tshhogs dang bcas pa rnams kyi bden pa dang / bcom ldan 'das /
analyzed: rtsha brgyud kyi bla ma mchog gsum rgyal ba rgya mtshho tshhogs dang cha ba rnams kyi bden ba dang joms ldan da

original: rig 'dzin rtsha gsum sgyu 'phrul drwa ba chen po'i /
analyzed: rig dzin rtsha gsum sgyu phrul drwa ba chen po

original: dkyil 'khor gyi lha tshhogs rnams kyi bden pa dang / bden pa chen po'i mthus /
analyzed: dkyil khor gyi lha tshhogs rnams kyi bden ba dang bden ba chen po mthus

original: deng 'dir slob bu rnams la dbang bskur zab mo bgyi ba la bar du gcod pa'i bgegs tshhogs thams cad gtor ma 'dis tshhims par gyis la 'dir ma gnas par gzhan du dengs shig
analyzed: deng dir slob bu rnams la dbang skur zab mo bgyid ba la ba du gcod ba bgegs tshhogs thams cad thor ma dis tshhims ba gyis la dir ma gnas ba gzhan du dengs shig

original: /gal te mi 'gro na khro bo ye shes kyi rdo rje me rab tu 'bar ba 'dis khyed rnams kyi mgo bo tshhal pa brgyar 'gas par 'gyur ta re /
analyzed: te mi gro na khro bo ye shes kyi rdo rje me rab tu bar ba dis khyed rnams kyi mgo bo tshhal ba brgyar gas ba gyur ta re

original: a+o~m sum+b+ha ni sogs kyis bgegs bskrad la /
